name: Authic
introduce: Authic is a no-code NFT marketplace solution  for brands and organisations from various industries like art, fashion, gaming, or sports to create and sell digital collectibles on their website. With FIAT payments like Credit Card/VISA, ApplePay, and iDEAL, KYC/AML integration tools, and easy-to-use wallets for storage, Authic Suite is making digital assets accessible to anyone.
